detectors.description: MST (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MST.sol#3-50) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:MST.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MST.sol#31-37)

MST.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MST.sol#31-37) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[_to] + _value < balanceOf[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MST.sol#33)
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MST.sol#34)
	- balanceOf[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MST.sol#35)
detectors.markdown:
[MST.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MST.sol#L31-L37) may have integer overflow

	- [balanceOf[_to] += _value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MST.sol#L35)
